Acu kan mačči s yiwen neɣ s sin kan n yimyura i yettarun deg tili ara nessali tasekla-nneɣ

Annar, akka i yettarwat, yelli-k win yebɣun yaɣ-itt.
Annar-a, yesɛan azal meqqren deg unegmu deg ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu.
Annay-agi icbeḥ aṭas.
Annaɣ a Sidi Ṛebbi, err-iyi ɣer taddart.
Annaɣ a yelli, i yeḍran yid-m.
Annaɣ a yemma ad mmteɣ.
Annaɣ a Ṛebbi!
Annaɣ i yeḍran d warraw-iw, annaɣ i yexdem ufus-iw.
Annaɣ lemmer cbiɣ tizya-w.
Annaɣ txedɛem taqbaylit ay iḍemmaɛen!
Annaɣ! ɛiwnet-iyi!
Annect n baba deg leεmer.
Annect nezmer i zemren.
Annect-a akken i nezmer ad d-nini yelha imi tteffɣen ɣef yidelsan n lbeṛṛani.
Annect-a ihi, s wudem ibanen, icudd ɣer yidles n tmetti, n ugdud, d tɣerma s timmad.
Annect-a nessen-it.
Annect-a ur yelli d ayla-k.
Annect-a yakk, akken ur d-ttuɣalen ara yineḍruyen yellan deg yiseggasen-a yezrin, d wayen yeɛnan asuffeɣ n yisental.
Annect-a yark, af udem-im!
Annect-a, yelha i tmeẓriwt, yelha i tmesliwt daɣ, acku meqqer, yeɛmer.
Annect-agi meṛṛa.
Annect-agi, ad ibeggen belli tutlayt d tasudut tanmettit, ur yezmir ara yiwen umdan weḥd-s ad tt-ibeddel.
Annect-agi, yella-d s lemɛawna gar Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Ugezdu d yiselwayen n tɣiwanin d yimezdaɣ-nneɣ diɣen.
Annenct-a meṛṛa i d-bedreɣ, yettarra tizlit ɣer deffir.
Annu ma iqwa ičča-k, ma iḍɛef ičča-k.
Annuz d tirrugza.

Anẓar d Ṛebbi n ugeffur.
Anẓar yeǧhed mačči d izli.
Apapas yeččur d lecɣal.
Apidyatr d amejjay n igʷerdan.
Apidyatṛ d amejjay yettdawin arrac.
Apsikyatr d amejjay n idarwicen.

Axaṭer Ameɣlal ikkes dderya i tlawin meṛṛa n twacult n Dda Ḥemmu ɣef ddemma n Ṣara, tameṭṭut n Abṛaham.
Axaṭer Ameɣlal iwala-d i lḥif-im.
Axaṭer Ibeṛquqen d iqeddacen-iw.
Axaṭer Illu iburek-iyi aṭas, ur yi-ixuṣṣ wacemma.
Axaṭer Illu yexdem amdan ɣef ṣṣifa-s.
Axaṭer Si Salaḥ ittwaɛzel d imqeddes i Yillu-is.
Axaṭer ad k-rreɣ d ababat n waṭas n yigduden.
Axaṭer ad t-rreɣ d lǧens ameqran.
Axaṭer akka i yi-d-ittunefk lameṛ.
Axaṭer akken i tettḥasabem ara tettuḥasbem.
Axaṭer anda yella ugerruj-ik, dinna i yella wul-ik.
Axaṭer annect-nni n wussan i yelaqen i uɛeṭṭer n lmegget.
Axaṭer aql-ak am Ferɛun.
Axaṭer axeddam yuklal lqut-is.
Axaṭer d aqeddac-ik, i yeḍemnen baba ɣef uqcic-agi.
Axaṭer d aseggas n ṣṣab, ad wen-yili d imqeddes.
Axaṭer d ayen iqedsen nezzeh.
Axaṭer d iqeddacen-iw i d-ssufɣeɣ si tmurt n Maṣer.
Axaṭer d leḥsab n lɣellat i k-d-izzenz.
Axaṭer ddnub n Imuriyen mazal ur iwwiḍ ara ɣer lḥedd-is.
Axaṭer deg unagraw n tutlayin, tufa-d iman-is teṭṭef tama n wadda.
Axaṭer di setta n wussan, Ameɣlal ixleq-d igenwan, lqaɛa, lebḥuṛ akked wayen meṛṛa i ten-iɛemṛen.
Axaṭer dinna i s-d-iḍher Yillu, mi akken yerwel ɣef gma-s.
Axaṭer inna-d: Nekk, d Mmi-s n Yillu.
Axaṭer iɣli-d laẓ di tmurt n Kanɛan.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, tefkam-iyi ččiɣ.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ, ur yi-tefkim ara ad ččeɣ.
Axaṭer lɣaci ḥesben-t d nnbi.
Axaṭer mi ara ṛuḥent ad swent, ulli-nni sseḍfarent.
Axaṭer nedmeɣ imi i ten-id-xedmeɣ.
Axaṭer nnuɣen yid-s.
Axaṭer s ided n lmefṣel n taɣma i yettwet Si Mḥemmed.
Axaṭer seg urrif-nni i rfan, nɣan irgazen;
Axaṭer tettwadehnem s zzit timqeddest n Umeɣlal.
Axaṭer tikli n yemdanen meṛṛa tefsed di ddunit.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq deg idammen i tella.
Axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq, d idammen-nni yellan deg-s.
Axaṭer tugwad dɣa inna-yas: Nniɣ-am teḍṣiḍ!
Axaṭer ul n ugdud-agi yeqqur!
Axaṭer ur tt-fkiɣ ara i mmi Cila, ad izweǧ yid-s.
Axaṭer ur tt-iɛqil ara belli d tislit-is.
Axaṭer walaɣ ayen akk i k-ixdem Laban.
Axaṭer wid yebɣan ad ddmen leɛmeṛ n uqcic, mmuten.
Axaṭer win yebɣan ad isellek taṛwiḥt-is ad tt-isṛuḥ.
Axaṭer zewǧen akk yid-s.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n wayen akken i xedmen i ten-keṛheɣ.
Axaṭer ɣef ddemma n yemdanen, ddunit teččuṛ d lbaṭel.

Ayen
Ayen a syadi lɛulam, tawim abrid mi t-tessnem.

Ayen akk ara nexdem ad yili i teqbaylit.
Ayen akk ara tedεum ad yettwaqbel
Ayen akk ara teqqim texla, ad teṛtiḥ.
Ayen akk ara tt-innalen ad yuɣal d imqeddes.
Ayen akk ara yekk wass netta ad tafeḍ yettẓala neɣ ad yeṭṭef adlis n leqran gar yifasen.
Ayen akk ara yekk ɣur-s, ad yili d axeddam n useggas.
Ayen akk i d am-n-uriɣ efk-as azal i yuklal.
Ayen akk i d am-nniɣ leqqem-it aru-t d ungal.
Ayen akk i d-am-nniɣ yella deg umezruy yakkan.
Ayen akk i d-nniɣ n d tidet.
Ayen akk i iyi-d-tenniḍ ad yaweḍ ɣer yemma, kkes aɣilif.
Ayen akk i yesɛa n ddwa temmeɣ tečča-t.
Ayen akk ideg ara teṭṭeṣ mi ara tili s tarda, ad inǧes.

Ayen akk iɣef ara yeqqim ad inǧes.

Ayen akka i yi-iruḥ yiḍes?

Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: "Efk-aɣ-d agzul ɣef uḍebsi-a-inek amaynut.

Aɣmis-a n yiḍelli.
Aɣmis-nni n yiḍelli.

Aɣrib i yeǧǧan tamurt.

Aɣrum neɣ seksu ur nedhin ara s zzit n uzemmur mačči d učči.

D acu kan, mi ara yesexdam umdan tameslayt-nni, igellu-d s ubeddel deg tseddast.
D acu kan, sḥassfeɣ imi asefru-nni amezwaru i uriɣ, iruḥ-iyi, ur ẓriɣ anda yerra.

D tameṭṭut.

Dda Amer Mezdad
Dda Bṛahim inna i iqeddacen-is: Qqimet dagi kenwi d uɣyul.
Dda Bṛahim inna-as: Ɣur-k ad tawiḍ mmi ɣer dinna!
Dda Bṛahim irra-as i Feṛṛuǧa, inna: a-tt-an tqeddact-im ɣur-m.
Dda Bṛahim iǧǧa-d ayen akk yesɛa i Isḥaq.
Dda Bṛahim iɛezl-d si tqeḍɛit-is sebɛa n tzamarin.
Dda Bṛahim yerna yenna: Ahat ad ilin dinna ṛebɛin?

Dda Mḥend yesserwet iḍelli irden.
Dda Sliman d amedyaz ifazen akk.
Dda Sliman iceyyeɛ afrux ifirelles ad s-d-yawi lexbar n tmurt.

Dda Ḥemmu, agellid n Girar, iceggeɛ ad s-d-awin Feṛṛuǧa.

Dɣa, iswi-nsen d amek ara yeḥrez umdan tawennaḍt anda yettidir.
Dɣa, ma tzemmreḍ ad aɣ-tefkeḍ taḥawact n tezrigt-agi tis sebɛa n temsizzelt Aysat Rabaḥ n tezdeg?
Dɣa, simmal ara ad d-tettili tririt d tuɣdimt, simmal ara d-ttbinent tifrat deg tejgut neɣ adur-nniḍen.
Dɣa, syin yettwaḥbes usarag.
Dɣa, tezmer ad ak-tessiweḍ teswiɛt ad tbeddleḍ ayen i d-tsumreḍ uqbel.
Dɣa, teḥbes ur d-tettarew ara.
Dɣa, yiwen n wass ad teglu s bab-is.
Dɣa, yunef-as.
Dγa argaz-nni ameqran, yemmekta-d tayri i iruḥen, yefhem belli ur d-tettwaγram, yeḥbes lmakla.
Dγa feqqeεen leḥwat imi ayen akken ḥwağen, ur d-yeddi ara.
Dγa, ad as-inin i temnifrit awi-d kan imi tselkeḍ am wakken d awezγi i d-yeḍran.

Gar yiswiyen n ugraw-a Asaru, d asebɣes d tmerna n ufud i wid ixeddmen ssinima taqbaylit.
Gar yiznan-a.
Gar yizri, d yizri ibaw.
Gar yiḍarren i yettnus wayen i yesɣemlen akk tikta.
Gar zik d tura deg tmurt n leqbayel.
Gar-aneɣ kan, tella tuḍen.
Gar-asen gma.
Gar-asen, tameɣra n ukermus.

Gar-asent ccna, aẓawan, amezgun, tasekla, isaragen, isura.
Gar-asent tamikanikt, trisiti d tsenselkimt.
Gar-awen ara ttiliɣ dima.

Ha-t-a nettraǧu inesramen n uẓru, ad aɣ-d-awin tawleft taneggarut ara nesqerdec.
Ha-t-an ad immet Tom.
Ha-t-an da iferres, ha-t-an dihin ileqqem iẓebbjan.
Ha-t-an di lḥebs.
Ha-t-an ihi win yeččan ul-is!
Ha-t-an la yessawal i win ara irun.

Ha-ten-ad akk da.

Hatan.

Hattan, tayi d tikti.
Haṛun ad isserɣ daɣen si lerwayeḥ-agi gar lmeɣreb akked lɛica, mi ara yettṣeggim tiftilin n lmeṣbaḥ.
Haṛun ad iṛucc s idammen-is idisan meṛṛa n uɛalṭar.
Haṛun d warraw-is xedmen akken i sen-d-inna Musa.
Haṛun irra-as: Di leɛnaya-k, ur reffu ara, a sidi!
Haṛun issusem, ur d-inni acemma.
Haṛun izweǧ akked Ilicaba, yelli-s n Ɛaminadab, weltma-s n Naḥcun.
Hbel.
Hder akken tebɣiḍ.
Hder cwiṭ, fhem aṭas.
Hder tura ɣer umikru.
Hdeṛ-as, d kečč ara s-ittaken lehduṛ ara yini.
Heblen merra?
Heblen ɣef teqbaylit.
Heblent ɣef teqbaylit.
Hebleɣ cwiṭ.

Hebleɣ fell-am.
Hebleɣ ɣef teqbaylit.
Hedden iman-ik!
Hedden, hedden, akka yakk medden!
Heddnem iman-nwen.
Heddnemt akk iman-nkent!
Heddnet iman-nwen.
Heddnet iman-nwent.
Heddren akk ɣef tikkelt.
Heddren kan s yimi, deg unnar ulac!
Heddren kan ɣer yiri n lkanun.
Heddreɣ ciṭuḥ tasluvinit.
Heddreɣ tahungrit.
Heddreɣ-ak, tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ.
Heddreɣ-am ɣellin-am!
Heddreɣ-am, tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ.
Heddreɣ-as ɣellin-as.
Heddreɣ-as, tugi ad tefhem.
Heddreɣ-as, yugi ad ifhem.
Heddreɣ-asent, ugint ad fehment.
Heddreɣ-awen, tugim ad tfehmem.
Heddṛen akk medden ɣef tsertit.
Heddṛen akk medden.
Heddṛen akked Yasuɛ.
Heddṛen s teqbaylit.
Heddṛen ur faɛlen.
Heddṛent s teqbaylit.

Heddṛeɣ s teqbaylit.
Heddṛeɣ ṣṣwab, ismeɛṛiq.

Hedren yid-neɣ.
Hedreɣ tasaεet yid-s.

Hedṛet!
Hedṛeɣ-as i mmi, ifhem mmi-s n ɛemmi.
Heggan akk iman-nsen.
Heggan asuref.
Heggan i waffug.
Heggan waman-is.

Heggant i waffug.
Heggant-d leqdicat i lmend n yennayer.
Heggaɣ i waffug.
Heggaɣ iman-iw s lemɣawla.
Heggi iman-im!
Heggi usu uqbel naddam.
Heggi usu, uqbel ad tennudmeḍ.
Heggi-aɣ icriḥen.
Heggi-iyi-d imensi.
Heggimt iman-nkent.
Helkeɣ lehlak d imexfi, wehmen ṭṭebba, ɛewqen.

Henni iman-im seg-sent!
Henni-yi kan.
Henni.

Hennit-yi kan.

Hey!
Heyyan-as-d asarag.
Heyyan-d ahil-nsen.

Ladɣa deg uḥric ideg yenna, "Yiwen wass yenṭeq uẓru, ad d-yini i yizgaren mmuh".
Ladɣa deg wussan n uzɣal.
Ladɣa deg yidgan i d-yezzin i wammasen n usɛeddi n yikayaden.
Ladɣa di tussna.
Ladɣa imi iswi-nneɣ d aserwes mačči d aglam.
Ladɣa ma gar-aneɣ ɣur-m ur leḥḥu ara.
Ladɣa mi ara twaliḍ acḥal d ilemẓi i itett wakal akken d ileqqaqen.
Ladɣa mi d-tbedreḍ tayri, dɣa yekfa yiɣisi.
Ladɣa mi rran ineggura-a tudert-nsen akk d ddin.
Ladɣa sseqdaceɣ aya.
Ladɣa tama-a d tin i yettwassnen s waṭas n tkebbunay n lpitrul.
Ladɣa tin n Mqidec d lunja.
Ladɣa tinezduɣin n ideg εeṭṭlen lecɣal nezzeh.
Ladɣa wid yeffren, neɣ wid ur nesɛi ara allalen akken ad d-banen.
Ladɣa widak yettidiren deg tlemmast n teẓgi.
Ladɣa.

Ma yella Cciṭan yessufeɣ Cciṭan, ifreq d yiman-is.
Ma yella d arraz Raccid Ɛallic yuɣal aseggas-agi i umyaru Sidali Lahdir s wungal-is Tirga n wul.
Ma yella d aseggas-a, azemz n yikayaden d yiwen deg kṛaḍ n yiɣerbazen.
Ma yella d imawlan-im ad ceyyɛeɣ ɣur-sen ad d-asen.
Ma yella d inelmaden n yiswiren ineggura, mazal ttṛaǧun-ten-id yikayaden.
Ma yella dima, ih.
Ma yella i menhu umi tekseḍ kra, azekka ad d-asen ad ak-ksen d acu tewwiḍ.
Ma yella iɛeṭṭel ad yeldi weḥd-s tawwurt.
Ma yella kečč tugiḍ-iyi, amek i tebɣiḍ nekk ad k-qebleɣ.
Ma yella kra i d as-tekkes?
Ma yella kra i kem-ixuṣsen ini-yi-d!
Ma yella nebɣa, nezmer.
Ma yella nekk ttwaḥebseɣ, tikta-inu berra ttcalint.
Ma yella nemmeslay-d ɣef Mhenni Xalifi, ad t-naf iqeddec deg unnar n teqbaylit, yefka-as azal meqqṛen.
Ma yella nemmeslay-d ɣef uselway n merra isarrawen-agi, Mass Musṭafa Zebdi, ad d-iniɣ d akken d amedya.
Ma yella nuɣal-d ɣef leswam-agi n yisufar i yulin.
Ma yella nuɣal-d ɣef wamek tettwasen tuddsa, ad naf d akken d iẓeḍwa inmettiyen.
Ma yella seg tama-nneɣ, ula d nekni nuklal asteεfu seld aseggas n uxeddim iweεṛen.
Ma yella smaḥ i taggara.
Ma yella ugar n kraḍ n yigiman n tuddar i yellan deg-s, ihi ad ilin ugar n leǧwamaɛ.
Ma yella ula yečča.
Ma yella ur d-nedhi ara yid-neɣ, yiwen, deg-neɣ ur d-idehhu.
Ma yella ur nudeɣ fell-am.
Ma yella ur teqqarem ara tasekla-nwen, mlet-iyi anwa ara tt-yeɣren.
Ma yella wayen illan yeḍra-d wakken, amek ara tgeḍ?
Ma yella yeṭṭef-d ulli d awkraren xelḍen, yexser.
Ma yella zik tutlayt-nneɣ d awal kan, ass-a nettaru-tt.
Ma yella ɣef uṣaḍuf n wurar-a, ama s wudem aglawan, neɣ aratak.
Ma yelḥa, ad dduɣ yid-s.
Ma yelḥa, ddiɣ yid-s.
Ma yemmut ad d-yennerni mmi-s
Ma yenna-d awal, d awal!
Ma yenna-yak ssired, ɣas ames!
Ma yeqfel uqerru n yiwen, hder-as s tefransist neɣ s teglizit, kifkif.
Ma yerbeḥ, ad d-icafeɛ iman-is.
Ma yerra-t waggur akin d turart s tarwiḥin.
Ma yesseglaf uydi, yugad.
Ma yewwet-ik ubeḥri sew-as atay s llim ad k-yekkes!
Ma yexḍa sswab i wawal, ma ad yili sswab di tsusmi.
Ma yeḥdeṛ bab-is, ulac fell-as leɣrama.
Ma yeṭṭef igenni, ad as-d-ibru fell-i!
Ma yif-ik gma-k lebṛuj, bnu s lyajuṛ urqim.
Ma yif-ik gma-k leɣrus, kker s afras d ttelqim.
Ma yif-ik gma-k meṭṭu, ay aḥbib xdem neɣ qqim.
Ma yufa-t yakan neɣ ma yestufa ad t-inadi.
Ma yugi baba-s ad s-tt-ifk, ad ixelleṣ s yidrimen azal n teɛmamt i ttaken ɣef tɛezriyin.
Ma yuli waggur, ula igan itran.
Ma ɛawdeɣ-d i ddunit-iw.
Ma ɛriɣ a bab-iw, ssels-iyi!
Ma ɣef tira, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ d akken tira n teqbaylit, a-tt-an deg ubrid usnerni.
Ma ɣef wayen i d-tessegra twaɣit-a, ad naf ukuẓ n yixeddamen i ijerḥen.
Ma ɣef wayen yerzan aẓawan-is, zyada ɣef wayen i d-yegmer ɣer yicennayen imeqqranen, yecban.
Ma ɣef yisuḍaf n tikkin di tfaska-a, yessefk ɣef yimedyazen ad aznen kraḍ n yisefra s tmaziɣt.
Ma ɣelḍeɣ, seɣtit-iyi.
Ma ḥezneɣ ad n-cetkiɣ i kemm.
Ma ṭṭfent-aɣ, nemmut nemmut.
Ma ṭṭfeɣ lḥaǧa, ad teɣli.
Ma.
Maca Malika Dumran terẓa asalu.
Maca ad d-tefɣen ilmend n tmurt i tetten arraw-is, umi semman war isem-is.
Maca ad kecmen s agezdu yernu ad xedmen ccɣel-nsen, mbeɛd mi niqal ugin-asen anekcum s agezdu d uxeddim.
Maca ad neɛreḍ ad d-nemmeslay ɣef yisenfaren imeqqranen.
Maca argaz ur yezmir ara ad yerkeḍ awal n yemma-s akked baba-s.
Maca ass-a ẓriɣ tidet.
Maca asteqsi: Ayen ḍarrunt cwalat, taggara-agi, deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri?
Maca asuɣu yugten d wi: Tuddsiwin senzent inelmaden akked Tuddsiwin senzent tasdawit.
Maca ayɣer?
Maca bɣiɣ takeṛṛust.
Maca deg wayen ara iruḥ ad iseṭṭel i yinuwar, yekcem deg yiwen n weɣsur.
Maca deg yiḍ mi fetren yimdanen, aṭas n leqdic i d-yettilin sɣur tiddukkliwin-a iseg i d-nezwar.
Maca i ẓẓher amcum, yuɣal d aɣyul.
Maca iban tecbeḥ ama d kra.
Maca imasayen n tallit-nni, fkan lamer i yiɣallen n laman am tannumi akken ad qerɛen imesbaniyen yessuturen azref-nsen.
Maca ma yessufuɣ ubrid-ik wicqa.
Maca nessaram ad tili xir n tezrigt iɛeddan.
Maca nessexdam allaɣ mi ara yezli wul.
Maca tettwaceqqeq tuddsa-agi deg useggas n alef u ttɛemya u xemsin.
Maca ur d-yekkir ara ɣlay?
Maca ur d-yesnulfa ara deg talɣa.
Maca ur sεiɣ ara idrimen.
Maca ur tettili d tidet
Maca ur ttɣiman ara, alamma fukkent-d akk tlawin tarda, ṛuḥent-d syin.
Maca ur yumin ara.
Maca yal wa s ubrid-is, s leɛtab-is, d tumert-is.
Maca yelha usirem.
Maca yessuter deg-i yiwen n ccɣel!
Maca yettili leqdic sɣur imnadiyen d yimazzagen, ɣef waya ad d-nini tleḥḥu ɣer sdat.
Maca yiwet yiwet, ad d-ɣellin yiwen yiwen.
Maca ɣas akka, mazal yettkemmil icennu, yettmuddu-d.
Maca! Werǧin i xdimeɣ kra bla ccur n baba.
Maca, Taqbaylit tezga yid-i.
Maca, akken ad yeddu uqeddic s zzreb, ilaq ad d-gren yiqbayliyen afus-nsen deg leqdic am wa.
Maca, ass-a ilaq waṭas n ufus sɣur yiqbayliyen-nneɣ.
Maca, deg yimal iqerben, yezmer ad d-yuɣal d anammas asegman i warrac merra n temnaḍt.
Maca, err iman-ik am akken aqli-k ɣef tizi lmut i telliḍ.
Maca, isemktiyen ttɣiman, urǧin ad sefḍen seg wallaɣ.
Maca, mbaɛd asteɛfu, agṛam n lǧehd ulac-it.
Maca, nettat simmal tettimɣur simmal yettban-d deg-s umgarad i tt-iεezlen ɣef tmetti, tawacult d tizya-s.
Maca, ssuma i as-d-yefka mačči d kra!
Maca, tid ixeddmen yid-s di lbiru ssneɣ-tent merra.
Maca, yal yiwen yezmer ad d-yerr agrudem n Facebook s teqbaylit ɣas akken ur imid ara.
Macahu, win d-innan ahu, ad ilhu.
Maci akk d irgazen.
Maci akka ay teḍra.
Maci d aya umi sliɣ.

Mačci s tadist i tella?
Mačči abrid mačči sin i aɣ-ɣeḍlen, maca win yefkan aẓar, ur yettagad ifer ma yeɣli
Mačči ad d-yettaɣ, syin ad yettḍeggir, akken daɣen ad yissin d acu i itett akken ur yettaḍen ara.

Mbaṭel.
Mbeɛb, irna-d gma-s, afus-is iṭṭef deg ugerz n Meẓyan.
Mbeɛd ad d-ffɣen syenna s ssɛaya tameqrant.
Mbeɛd aneḥbus ɣef leqraya i wazal n ddurt.
Mbeɛd as-d, tebɛ-iyi.
Mbeɛd awal n tazwara n unemhal n uɣerbaz-a amenzu.
Mbeɛd ayagi, ad ffɣeɣ.
Mbeɛd aḥemmal-nni ameqran, sɛan-d arrac.
Mbeɛd indem, dɣa iṛuḥ.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ izdeɣ di Girar.
Mbeɛd iṛuḥ si tmurt.
Mbeɛd leqdic d unadi d leɛtab n wacḥal d aseggas.
Mbeɛd mi cnan ihellilen ulin s iɣil n Uzemmur.
Mbeɛd mi mḥezwarent snat n tuddar-a Saḥel di Buzgan akked Lqelɛa n At Ɛebbas deg Yiɣil Ɛli di Bgayet.
Mbeɛd mi t-ṣellben, ferqen llebsa-s s tesɣart.
Mbeɛd mi teɛedda twaɣit-agi, teḍra-d tayeḍ i tt-yecban.
Mbeɛd mi yekker uxxam ad yelḥu deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri.
Mbeɛd neffu ɣer Babil, Yaxunya yesɛa-d Caltiyil.
Mbeɛd sebɛa n wussan n tikli, ilḥeq-it s adrar n Gilɛad.
Mbeɛd talalit n Dda Crif, Ramḍan iɛac mitin n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Mahalalil, Qiynan iɛac tmen meyya u ṛebɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Nuḥ, Limix iɛac xems meyya u xemsa u ttsɛin n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Qiynan, Anuc iɛac tmen meyya u xemseṭṭac n iseggasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd talalit n Sarug, Raɛu iɛac mitin u sebɛa n iseggasen.
Mbeɛd talalit n Yirid, Mahalalil iɛac tmen meyya utlatin n iseggwasen, yerna yesɛa-d arrac akked tullas.
Mbeɛd yuɣal-d ikemmel lhedṛa yid-sen.

Mi ara d-teḍilleḍ a tiziri.
Mi ara d-tlal d teqcict, berrun i wallen-nsen.
Mi ara d-tuɣaleḍ, εeddi-d si tḥanut.

Mi ara iliɣ yid-k ferḥeɣ.
Mi ara imɣureɣ, ad d-ffɣeɣ am kečč swaswa.
Mi ara iǧǧuǧeg lemleḥ, ad isɛu uɛdaw ṣṣeḥ.
Mi ara leqḍen azemmur zik, yettεedday-d γef sin n yiberdan, mgaraden, γer wanda leḥḥun.
Mi ara mɣareɣ, ad d-ffɣeɣ am kemm swaswa.
Mi ara nebdu ccɣel, ḥman idammen, ur nettḥulfu ara s ɛeggu.
Mi ara nexdem akk anect-a, ad nekcem imir ad nẓeḍ.
Mi ara nezmer akka ad tt-neṭṭasi, ad tt-nessed akkit akkayi.
Mi ara nwali acḥal i yettmettaten deg yiberdan.
Mi ara nwali asegzawal aynutlay i d-iga Mass kamel Buεmara.
Mi ara nɛedi ɣer yiḍes, mi ara nsers aqerruy-nneɣ ɣer tsumta.
Mi ara refdeɣ abendayer.
Mi ara s-ɣerqent i wuccen, yettarra-tt i yibeɛɛucen.
Mi ara slen yegduden, ad rgagin, ad d-teɣli rrehba ɣef Ifilistiyen.
Mi ara sɛuɣ akud, ad d-ceɣleɣ yid-s.
Mi ara tawḍeḍ ɣer uxxam, siwel-iyi-d.
Mi ara tebduḍ taɣuri-s nekk ad iliɣ bdiɣ rekkuɣ ddaw n wakal.
Mi ara terwiḍ tamda, ad d-ikker wallaɣ-is.
Mi ara tetteddu, tettecrurud am tsekkurt.
Mi ara tettmuquleḍ ad tinigeḍ.
Mi ara tettẓallam, ur xeddmet ara am wat sin wudmawen.
Mi ara teṭṭṣem, yiwen ur kwen-isfeɛfiɛ.
Mi ara theddrem, ur teffẓet ara imeslayen.
Mi ara theddreḍ tteffẓeḍ imeslayen.
Mi ara theddreḍ, ur teffeẓ ara imeslayen.
Mi ara tibɛid fell-i ugar dɣa ẓriɣ ad iyi-tettu maḍi.
Mi ara tiliḍ gar wallen-iw.
Mi ara tleḥqeḍ ɣer tlemmas n ubrid, ɣiwel cwiṭ kan.
Mi ara tnehrem, ur hedret ara deg tilifun.
Mi ara ttnaɣen sin, ttḥuddu-ten!
Mi ara tuɣaleḍ, εeddi si tḥanut.
Mi ara wwen yigumma, ɣellin-d ɣef tmurt.
Mi ara wwent tbexsisin akken i ilaq, ttuɣalent d iniɣman.
Mi ara yeffeɣ yiwen seg wid ixeddmen di tiddukkla ɣer unnar, d acu i ilaq ad yini.
Mi ara yelhu lḥal, Tom yettaǧǧa asfaylu-s yeldi.
Mi ara yezweǧ, d taɛezrit ara d-yawi.
Mi ara yeččar yiẓdi-nni, ad t-id-nekkes d afus.
Mi ara yeɣli yiṭij, iyuzaḍ ɛennun akantu-nsen.
Mi ara yi-d-yini umɛellem-iw xdem aya neɣ aya.
Mi ara yili yid-s, akud ur as-yettaki.
Mi ara yuɣal, ad t-yaf d ilem, zeddig yerna yecbeḥ.
Mi ara ɣreɣ aḍris aseklan ad afeɣ awennet di tazwara yettvan-iyi-d icemmet aḍris-nni.
Mi as-ɣriɣ, yezzi-d.
Mi as-ḥkiɣ ɣef wayen i yeḍran terfa aṭas fell-i.
Mi bdiɣ gezzuɣ tuzzuft i fehmeɣ gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut kan i tettili.
Mi bdiɣ ḥelluɣ, suffɣen-iyi-d seg sbiṭar n yimexlal.
Mi d iyi-teǧǧiḍ weḥceɣ.
Mi d tewḍeḍ ɣer sdat n sbiṭar ur ttṣuni ara, d imuḍan i yellan.
Mi d-ddan yidi i teɣzi n wayyur n Remḍan.
Mi d-ddant tlufa ad texreb tnafa.
Mi d-ffɣen si Yariḥu, aṭas n lɣaci i t-itebɛen.
Mi d-ffɣen sɣur Ferɛun, mmugren-d Muḥend akked Mḥend i ten-yuṛǧan di beṛṛa, dɣa ɣlin deg-sen.
Mi d-ffɣen, burken agdud.
Mi d-iffeɣ seg uqiḍun n Nna Feḍmuca, ikcem s aqiḍun n Meɛǧuṭa.
Mi d-iffeɣ, iqqar i wat Iwaḍiyen lumuṛ i s-d-ifka Umeɣlal.
Mi d-ikcem uday n mmi-m, terriḍ iman-im d lmumen.
Mi d-ilul uqcic-nni, Yahuda yufa-t-id lḥal di Kazib.
Mi d-inna ḥatt, ini-as batt.
Mi d-inna, baba yečča yeṛwa.
Mi d-iwweḍ yisɣi, tban tefsut.
Mi d-kkreɣ ufiɣ yiwen agḍiḍ deg texxamt.
Mi d-mmektaɣ ad iyi-d-tali tegrint.
Mi d-mmektiɣ uɣaleɣ ttuɣ.
Mi d-nusa, nufa-d agezdu n Tizi Uzzu, yesɛa agellel d ameqqran deg unegmu.
Mi d-teffeɣ seg tesdawit, abrid i as-yehwan taɣ-it.
Mi d-tefli gar tizya, tecba tiziri n ṣṣbeḥ.
Mi d-tefrari tafat, nettat ad tt-yaɣ lḥal deg tebḥirt.
Mi d-teggra weḥds tesɛa lweqt ad txemmem.
Mi d-teldi tawwurt n texxamt-iw, tella tlehhet.
Mi d-teqqimeḍ ɣer tama-w, ad am-iniɣ ṣebb ay amcic.
Mi d-ters tnafa ad dunt tlufa.
Mi d-tewweḍ tmeddit, yufa-t-id lḥal weḥd-s dinna.
Mi d-teḍra tedyant-a.
Mi d-tkecmeḍ deg yimi n tewwurt.
Mi d-tnehreḍ takerrust, muqel deg lemri alemmas d yiqerniyen.
Mi d-tsumreḍ awal, yezmer ad ak-d-iban ixuss ar deqqal.
Mi d-tuddreḍ aqjun, ɣas heggi-d aɛekkaz.
Mi d-tufiḍ amecṭuḥ, aderɣal, tamɣart, amɣar, ɛiwen-it ad yezger.
Mi d-tuki i tikelt tis snat iɣegdan-nni ttwaksen.
Mi d-tusa ɣur-neɣ, d acu i aɣ-tenna?
Mi d-tɛeddaḍ sdat n uɣerbaz d tesnawit, nher s lemḥadra.
Mi d-tṣuḍeḍ s wanzaren-ik, ad nnejmaɛen waman.
Mi d-uɣalen warraw n Si Mḥemmed si lexla, slan s wayen yeḍran.
Mi d-uɣaleɣ ad d-jebdeɣ ayla-w s lfayda.
Mi d-wwḍen imezwura, ɣillen ad awin akteṛ.
Mi d-yeffeɣ seg yixeddim, yečča tanalt-is n tmeddit.
Mi d-yeffeɣ si lḥebs, yuɣal ɣer Fṛansa s lekwaɣeḍ ur nṣeḥḥa ara.
Mi d-yekker ad yuɣal.
Mi d-yessekfel tamuɣli, ad iqelleb ɣef tidet-is gar-as d yiman-is.
Mi d-yeswa, iteddu yettemderkal, d abrid ur t-yeɛqil.

Mi d-yuki, yaf-d iman-is deg yiwet n tegzirt yestexlan.

Mkes.

Mkul yiwen ixelleṣ iman-is.

Mlalen sin igehguhen.

Mured.
Musa akked Haṛun kecmen s aqiḍun n temlilit.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i d-yessendeh Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Haṛun xedmen akken i sen-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa akked Ilya ḍehren-asen-d.
Musa iburek-iten.
Musa ihdeṛ i wat Uɣrib.
Musa iheddeṛ, Illu yettarra-as-d si tlemmast n ṛṛɛud.
Musa iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iɛeggeḍ ɣer Umeɣlal, inna-as: D acu ara xedmeɣ i ugdud-agi?
Musa iɣawel ikna ɣer lqaɛa, iseǧǧed.
Musa iɣumm udem-is, axaṭer yugad ad imuqel ɣer Yillu.
Musa iḍegger asɣar-nni s aman, imiren aman-nni uɣalen ḥlawit.
Musa iṛucc s idammen-nni, idisan meṛṛa n uɛalṭar.
Musa iṛuḥ, iɛawed i Umeɣlal ayen akken i s-d-inna ugdud.
Musa iṣubb s agdud, ihdeṛ-asen.
Musa tekcem-it tugdi, inna: Slan akk medden s temsalt-agi!
Musa yeddem tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is, isserkeb-iten ɣef yiɣyal, dɣa ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n At Jennad.
Musa yeffeɣ-d sɣur Ferɛun, iɛenna ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yekker netta d Yacuɛa, amɛiwen-is, yuli s adrar n Yillu.
Musa yekker-d isellek-itent seg-sen, dɣa yessew taqeḍɛit-nsent.
Musa yenna i Ferɛun: Ḥaca-k, ay agellid!
Musa yenna i Haṛun: D acu i k-ixdem ugdud-agi armi i t-teǧǧiḍ ixdem ddnub yecban wagi?
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: A-t-an tenniḍ-iyi-d: Awi agdud-agi!
Musa yenna i Umeɣlal: Di leɛnaya-k, a Sidi!
Musa yenna-asen: D ayen i d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal.
Musa yenna-asen: Ur ttagadet ara!
Musa yenna-asen: ɣur-wat win ara d-iǧǧen seg-s i ṣṣbeḥ.
Musa yenna-yasen: wwtet-tt ihi, ass-agi.
Musa yenna: ad d-zziɣ i inijel akken ad waliɣ d acu-t leɛǧeb-agi!
Musa yeqsed ad izdeɣ s argaz-nni.
Musa yerra afus-is deg iciwi-s, mi t-id-ikkes, yuɣal ufus-is d amellal am udfel si lberṣ.
Musa yerra-as: Mi ara ffɣeɣ seg uxxam-ik, ad ɛenniɣ ɣer Umeɣlal.
Musa yerra-as: Wagi d aɛekkaz.
Musa yerra-asen: Acuɣer akka i tettnadim ccwal?
Musa yesbedd aqiḍun n temlilit, isers tikersiyin, issuli tincirin, isɛedda iɛmuden, isbedd tigejda.
Musa yexdem akken zdat n imeqranen n Isṛayil.
Musa yexdem ayen akk i s-d-yumeṛ Umeɣlal, akken i yexdem.
Musa yezla-t, iṛucc s idammen-is aɛalṭar meṛṛa.
Musa yuli s adrar, dɣa tagut tɣumm adrar.
Musa yura ayen akk i s-d-inna Umeɣlal.
Musa yuɣ awal i uḍeggal-is, ixdem ayen akk i s-d-inna.
Musa, iqbel ayen akken i s-d-inna Haṛun.

Muḥemmed Buḍyaf d aselway n lezzayer yettwanɣan srid ɣef tilivizyu tazzayrit.

Muḥemmed Uharu d yiwen deg-sen, ɣas ulac-it, maca s wayen i d-yeǧǧa d leqdic d yigerrujen yella.
Muḥemmed Uharun d yimdukal-is, d wid ur nerri ara aḍar ɣer deffir.
Muḥemmed Uharun, ikemmel deg ubrid n tira, dɣa yura ammud n tmedyazt “Abrid n tlelli”.
Muḥemmed netta yenna d lǧenn i d-yerzan ɣur-s ɣer yifri-nni.

S wakka ad d-yili ufares deg yakk taɣulin, d usnerni n uselmed-ines akken ad tettusemres yal ass.
S wakka ara tɛerrim Imaṣriyen!
S wakka i yeṣber Isḥaq ɣef yemma-s.
S wakka i yeẓra Nuḥ belli neɣsen waman di ddunit.
S wakka iḍ kamel, wa ur iqerreb ɣer wa.

Syen akkin ad zellin tisigert i ugdud.
Syenna Yasuɛ ikemmel abrid.
Syenna ara s-d-tawiḍ tameṭṭut i mmi.
Syenna yexfa, axaṭer iṛfedɛ-it neɣ irfed-it Yillu.
Syenna, iṛuḥ, yuɣal s axxam-is.
Syin akin deg unebdu, ad tili yiwet n tesɣert taɣelnawt.
Syin akkin d anamzul n uselway deg walef u ttɛemya u waḥ€d u settin.
Syin akkin, yebda ufraq n warrazen ɣef yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg yal tasmilt.
Syin akkin, yuɣal s axxam.
Syin deg unebdu, ad nruḥ ɣer teftisin anda ara yili, daɣen, leqdic meqqren i yeɛnan awellah n umsider.
Syin ikemmel amennuɣ deg urebbi n umussu adelsan amaziɣ.
Syin tebda teqqar aẓawan n cceɛbi deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu.
Syin yedhem-d ccwal, yerẓa-d tiwwura, yenneqlab uxxam-a ɣef uqerru-is, yiwen ur yefhim d acu i iḍerrun.
Syin yennerna unamek n wawal deg uḍris.
Syin yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt deg walef u ttɛemya u ṛebɛa u xemsin.
Syin ɣer-s ɣer yimerẓi i d-yellan gar yiwen n usdawan d yiwen n uselmad deg ugezdu-a.
Syin ɣer-s, ad yili wass-nniḍen, ad nemmeslay ɣef lemḍarrat n yisufar n tgella ladɣa deg unebdu.
Syin ɣur-s, yeqqim ɛecra n yiseggasen, i wakken ad yernu tasfift-is taneggarut, iwumi iga isem Fliksi-as-d.
Syin, ad nefru taluft akken i d-tewwi.
Syin, ikemmel abrid d asawen akked Mennad, cergen lebḥer d abrid ɣer tmurt n tirga.
Syin, ssawlen i Budyaf ɣer Merruk i waken ad yuɣal d aselwaya n Lezzayer imi ttwaḥebsent tefranin.
Syin, tigzi n tmacint i as-yettwaskecmen ad d-teṭṭef tugna akken ad tsuneḍ i yiɣil-is ad yebdu asuneɣ.
Syin, yessawel-d i yiwen n lǧar-is yeččuren d nneyya daɣ am netta.
Syin, yettwanɣa srid deg wass n tesɛa uɛecrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttsɛin deg temdint n Ɛennaba.
Syin, yuɣal d imḍebber n "Le groupe de choc" yettabaɛen akabar n Tirni n uslelli aɣelnaw.
Syinna i d-yebda aserbeḥ.

Takfarinas d Buǧemɛa Agraw sin n walbumen i d-ssufɣen lwaḥi.
Takfarinas iɛac meyya u tlata u tlatin n iseggasen.
Taki d tudert-iw a baba ad xedmeɣ yis-s ayen i bɣiɣ.
Taki mačči d tameṭṭut-iw.
Taklatin di tekwatin.
Taklit ad as-d-tettagem.
Takrabaṭ n Yuba d tawṛaɣt.

Tal tafsut s tefsut-is!
Tal tafsut, s tefsut-is.
Tal tanezzayt, ibalmuden ttruḥun s aɣerbaz.
Tal tanezzayt, yettseṭṭil i yiman-is tamart.
Tal tikkelt ara iɛeddi ad yečč yessirid ifassen-is.
Tal tuttra ɣur-s tiririt-ines.
Tal tuttra ɣur-s tiririt.

Tala n tjaddit
Talaba, teɛǧeb win i tt-yersan mačči d win i tt-yeẓḍan.
Talalit n Binyamin akked lmut n Meɛǧuṭa i iṛuḥen si Bitil.
Tallit ideg i nella d Remḍan, tuget n yixeddamen senɣasen seg uxeddim, rnu azɣal i d-yettilin deg uzal.
Tallit n ẓẓmik d leḥris.
Talsa teǧǧa-tt leḥnana.
Taluft yekfan mazal tayeḍ.
Taluft-a gar-i d mmi, wiyiḍ ur sɛin ara awal fell-as.
Taluft-a tugar-iyi.

Tameddit
Tameddit akk nettat tessewway.
Tameddit igerrzen.
Tameddit n wass-nni n larebɛa i iɛeddan, tlata deg yulyu zuǧ alaf u seεṭac.
Tameddit ula i nawi.
Tameddit yelhan.
Tameddit, mi d-yekcem testeqsa-t ɣef wahil n lxedma-ines n uzekka-nni.

Tameddit-a, ad ak-n-ceggεeɣ tansa n usmel-nni.
Tameddit-a, ad am-n-ceggεeɣ tansa n usmel-nni.

Tameqrant isem-is Nna Feḍmuca, ma d tamecṭuḥt isem-is Meɛǧuṭa.

Tamezgida
Tamezgida d tilemt.

Tamečča-a tesgermic.
Tameɣbunt ur tuksan ara.

Tameγra n lebḥeṛ urğin telli.
Tameṭṭut ad teḥbes tarrawt anda kan tezmer s uḥebber.

Tameṭṭut d lsas, argaz d ajgu alemmas.

Tameṭṭut d tamda, argaz d targa.

Tameṭṭut iḥerrzen, tif tayuga ikerrzen.
Tameṭṭut iḥerzen axxam-is, fiḥel lḥerz fiḥel aɛessas.

Tanmirt a massa

Tidet ad yi-tetteẓẓem.
Tidet am tenkerra n tudert.
Tidet am tyita n tmekḥelt.
Tidet am yiṭij, win i tt-iqerben aṭas ad ireɣ.
Tidet d lɛafya yerɣan, ẓẓaẓneɣ-tt tečča-iyi nnekwa.
Tidet iqerrḥen wala lekdeb yessefraḥen.
Tidet isgaǧ-itt ṭṭmaɛ.
Tidet kan yeɛjeb-iyi wamek tkecmeḍ deg tnefsit n tmeṭṭut-a.
Tidet kan, d acu tenniḍ?
Tidet kan, mačči seg yiwet n tama kan i yi-tessewhem.
Tidet kan, teɛǧeb-iyi teqcict-nni.

Tidet ma ad as-beddleɣ lmul.
Tidet qerriḥen mačči menwala yezmer a tt-id-yessiwel.

Tigawt!
Tigawt-nsen tamezwarut i yetturaǧun ad tili, d asarag ɣef unegmu idumen s umata d win n tɣiwant s wuzzig.
Tigedrin-nni tujjixin sbelɛent sebɛa n tgedrin-nni yelhan.
Tigejda meṛṛa yessemlal-itent s yeɛmuden n lfeṭṭa.
Tigejdit ɣef tebna tarrayt.
Tigellelt tella anda teqqleḍ.
Tigemmi tamaziɣt d tamesbaɣurt.
Tigeẓẓal d tiṣeffayin n yidammen.
Tigi d timsal-nniḍen.
Tiglubulin tizeggaɣin akked tcebḥanin sɛant azal d ameqqran deg tfekka.
Tigusa n tnezduɣt, tigusa n ufrag akked imurar-nsent meṛṛa.
Tigzirin Tiknariyin.
Tihendusit d asɣan i ṭṭafaren deg udu-menẓaw ahendi.

Tijebbadin, ad jebdent aẓeṭṭa akken ad yeṭṭef iman-is.
Tijeǧǧigin i d-yemɣin di tqernit.
Tikci n warrazen i ukuẓ n yinelmaden imenza, i d-yufraren s tezmilt igerrzen deg ukayad n uswir wis semmus.
Tikci s teɣṛaṛt, areṭṭal s tmeḥḥaṛt.
Tikelt-a mačči kifkif.
Tikelt-a tεeddaḍ tilas.
Tikerkest tezga deg imi-nsen.
Tikkelt ad tafeḍ ikerrez, tikkelt imegger neɣ isserwat.
Tikkelt taneggarut i t-walaɣ, deg Tizi Uzzu, aseggas neɣ aseggas d uzgen send timenɣiwt-ines.
Tikkelt-a azemmur yurew ma d ilindi ulac maḍi.
Tikkelt-a dɣa, s tallelt n tɣiwant n At Smaɛel, wwin-ten ɣer teẓgi n Takkuct.
Tikkelt-a, ufraren kraḍ n yimyura deg warraz n tullist i yettuɣalen d tajmilt n Belɛid At Ɛli.
Tikkelt-agi mačči d netta i d as-d-yerran.
Tikkelt-nni d tayaẓiḍt i d-yuker.
Tikkelt-nniḍen ad n-aseɣ.
Tikkelt-nniḍen.
Tikkwal tneqq tbuzeggaɣt.
Tikkwal yettcawar-itt ula di lumur n lxedma-ines.
Tikkwal yettinig ɣer tmura n lbarrani deg ukatar n umahil-ines.
Tikkwal yettuḥettem fell-as ad iɛeṭṭel di lxedma alarma d iḍ.
Tikli n wassa, agdud yella armi d ulamek!
Tikli n ɣriba tettqerrib ɣer tzeqqa-nni.
Tikli tis mraw d kraḍ n yinelmaden n tesdawit.
Tikli ɣef uḍar, ur tufiḍ anda ara t-tawi.
Tikli-s d asqeṛdec.
Tikta am ti ilaq ad ttwakksent deg wallaɣen.
Tikta deg uqerruy am uglaf.
Tikta-agi n ṣwab akked lmeɛqul uɣent amḍiq deg wallaɣ-iw.
Tikta-w, tezgiḍ deg-sen.
Tikti n lebni n usebddad-agi n Cacnaq, tusa-aɣ-d asmi nesfugel yennayer iɛeddan.
Tikti tatrart tettlal-d deg wallaɣ yeftin.
Tikti-a, d ayen i t-iceɣben seg wasmi i d-yekker
Tikti-k tgerrez.
Tikti-nni izedɣen allaɣ-is, yiwen ur yezmir ad as-tt-yesfeḍ.
Tikti-ya n tikli deg ass n lǧemɛa, ɣer Maṣer i tt-id-wwin.
Tikti-yagi telha.
Tiktiwin caḍent, ta tettdeggir ta.
Tikwal diɣen ttaččaren tiqrinin n ucwari d leɣber n yiɣersiwen-nsen.
Tikwal ikess ulli d wakraren-is.
Tikwal llant tmucuha ur d-tettfakka ara deg yiwen n yiḍ.
Tikwal llant tuddar s sin n leǧwamaɛ, di lawan ideg timesgidiwin ttenqasent rennunt.
Tikwal ma d-teffeɣ.
Tikwal nessexdam ayen akk qessiḥen.
Tikwal nessuddus isaragen neɣ tiɣimiyin n usileɣ i lfayda n yilemẓiyen, ladɣa wid yeqqaren deg yigezda n tmaziɣt.
Tikwal nettandi tifextin akked ticeṛktin.
Tikwal s nnefḥa!
Tikwal tirga ttuɣalent d tilawt.
Tikwal ttakreɣ.
Tikwal ttsetḥiɣ s yiman-iw.
Tikwal ulac tamella deg ugama.
Tikwal ur yesɛi ara ula d ussan i usteɛfu.
Tikwal yessagad-iten.
Tikwal yettaweḍ almi d aseggas neɣ sin i wid iḥekmen s ɛecra n yiseggasen d asawen.
Tikwal yettbin-iyi-d lḥal qrib ad tenger.
Tikwal ɣas s lḥiǧab ad k-teɛǧeb teqcict.
Tikwal ɣellin-d yitran qqaren as i waggur aql-aɣ da.
Tikwal εeyyuɣ deg tikli.
Tikwal, llan yimestjaren i yessexsayen imsismeḍ, syin ɣer-s, ad yexser usafar-nni.
Tikwal, ttaṭṭafen-t tallit merra.
Tilas gar Waεrab d Uqbayli.
Tilawin ad cennunt yid-s.
Tilawin beṭṭunt kullec.
Tilawin di taddart.
Tilawin iteddun deg yiberdan, d tid ittennaɣen ɣef yizerfan-nsent.
Tilawin la xeddment.
Tilawin meqqren akk deg twacult-iw lsant-tt.
Tilawin ttefṛaqent kullec.
Tilawin yellan d tizziwin-iw ɛeyyant deg ttrebga.
Tilawin ẓewwrent deg ulqaḍ n uzemmur n leqwaɛi.
Tilawin-nni d xwalti.
Tilawin-nni d εmumti.
Tilaykit d afraq n ddin ɣef uwanek d lumuṛ izuyaz.
Tilelli n teflest d azref seg izerfan n wemdan.
Tilelli n tefrit ur telli deg tmurt-a-nneɣ.
Tilelli n tuzzuft.
Tilelli n umeslay tettwagdel di tmurt n lezzayer.
Tilelli n umeslay, ur ilaq ara ad teqqim d awal kan.
Tilelli s wazal-is.
Tilelli tesɛa azal.
Tilelli ula i tmeṭṭut-ik d yelli-k, mačči i tiyaḍ kan.
Tilelli umeslay ur telli ɣur-sen.
Tilelli ur tesliḥ; ḥaca ma tessxedmeḍ-tt.
Tilelli ur tettnuz ara.
Tilelli ur tettwafras ara, ad temmels akken tella.
Tilemẓit, i tt-iceɣben d tayri.

Ul ad yergagi, mačči seg semmiḍ.
Ul d agellid, udem d ayeddid.
Ul d aleqqaq,d aḥnin, yettfeggiḍ d afrayen yeswayen tameddurt.

Ul ihenna-yi.

Ul-iw yettɣiḍ, yeččewčew imennan

Yenna Karim Tabu deg usarag-is: " ttuɣ ma d aqbayli i lliɣ."

Yenna-as s uɛekki, wagi uriɣ-t asmi qqimeɣ ɣef tseṭṭa n weqjun.

Yenna-as urgaz-is

Yenna-as uyaziḍ. "Anda yella llqeḍ yid-m a lalla?"
Yenna-as uḍeggal-is, anef-as ad ternu kra n wussan.
Yenna-as: A wi yufan ilel d iɣi ma d igenni d tameḍluɛt.
Yenna-as: Nekk ad zbuɣ ma d kečč ad taruḍ.

Yenna-asent: Aql-i yid-kent alma d lmut.

Ɣas ad d-yeɣli yiḍ, ad qqimeɣ ar d-tawḍeḍ.

Ɣas akken tameṭṭut taqbaylit zik d lɛib ad tecnu.

Ɣas akken, tɣaḍ-it.

Ɣef waya ay d-ttreɣ!
Ɣef waya ay d-usiɣ.
Ɣef waya ay lliɣ da.

Ɣef waya!
Ɣef waya, ad d-nger tiɣri i Yiqbayliyen akken ad ttarun s waṭas s tutlayt taqbaylit deg Facebook.
Ɣef waya, tira tgerrez ama deg usenfali neɣ deg umawal.
Ɣef wayag i tmuceɛ tddukkla.
Ɣef wayagi i s-isemma Galɛid.
Ɣef wayagi i s-tsemma Dan, yeɛni iḥkem.
Ɣef wayagi i s-tsemma Lewwi, yeɛni tuṭṭfa.
Ɣef wayagi i s-tsemma Naftali, yeɛni amennuɣ.
Ɣef wayagi i s-tsemma Yahuda, yeɛni win yettḥemmiden.
Ɣef wayagi i yesemma i umkan-nni Sukut, yeɛni iɛecwan.
Ɣef wayagi i yettusemma Adum, yeɛni Azubaɣ.
Ɣef wayagi ur zzenzen ara tiferkiwin-nsen.
Ɣef wayagi, ad tettuɛaqbem yiwen n lɛiqab, d aqesḥan.
Ɣef wayagi, ḥlal ad txedmeḍ lxiṛ deg wass n usteɛfu.
Ɣef wayen icudden ɣer tsuqilt tawurmant, nsenker yiwen n usenfar yakan i itezzin ɣef teqbaylit.
Ɣef wudem-is iban yeskiddib.
Ɣef wučči i itezzi yizi.
Ɣef xemsa-agi ixuṣṣen, ad tesnegreḍ tamdint meṛṛa?

Ẓṛant dacu i xeddment.
Ẓṛant-kem neɣ ala?
Ẓṛant-ken neɣ ala?
Ẓṛant-ten neɣ ala?
Ẓṛemt-tt.
Ẓṛet-tt.
Ẓṛiɣ Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ aqjun.
Ẓṛiɣ aydi.
Ẓṛiɣ belli Tom meẓẓi fell-i.
Ẓṛiɣ belli ad yerbeḥ Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ belli d Tom i imeẓẓiyen fell-i.
Ẓṛiɣ belli d asiwel n Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ d acu-t.
Ẓṛiɣ d acu-tt.
Ẓṛiɣ dacu i bɣiɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ dacu i xeddmeɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ dakken ɣuṛ-i lḥeɣ.
Ẓṛiɣ kullec.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛam lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛamt lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ tesɛiḍ lḥeq.
Ẓṛiɣ walebɛaḍ issuden Tom.
Ẓṛiɣ-t ass-a.
Ẓṛiɣ.
Ẓẓaden, ggaren awren.
Ẓẓal s wul-ik.
Ẓẓan isekla.
Ẓẓareɣ-t kan tikkal.
Ẓẓay aṭas uselkim-a.
Ẓẓay aṭas usenduq-a.
Ẓẓay ccɣel-ik.
Ẓẓay fell-ak wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-am wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-am wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-as wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-as wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-asen wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-asen wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-awen wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-awen wawal?
Ẓẓay fell-aɣ wawal.
Ẓẓay fell-i wawal.
Ẓẓay i reffu!
Ẓẓay maca zemreɣ-as.
Ẓẓay mačči d afessas.
Ẓẓay ublaḍ-nni.
Ẓẓay uqerruy-is.
Ẓẓay-it ṛwan.
Ẓẓayet fell-as s waṭas.
Ẓẓayet tbalizt-a.
Ẓẓayet ur s-zmireɣ ara.
Ẓẓayeḍ i ccɣel.
Ẓẓayit igerrumen-a.
Ẓẓaẓneɣ.
Ẓẓebra n umzil ẓẓayet nezzeh.
Ẓẓebra ẓẓayet, d uzzal.
Ẓẓed.
Ẓẓeg.
Ẓẓel afus-ik, tbeɛ-it!
Ẓẓel afus-ik, tettebɛeḍ-t.
Ẓẓel iɣallen-ik.
Ẓẓel iɣallen-im.
Ẓẓel.
Ẓẓerb yeqmeḍ uffu.
Ẓẓeǧǧ tacekkart n walim i uḥeggan.
Ẓẓeṭla d zzit uzemmur, iṭij abeḥri tili.
Ẓẓgen tafunast-nni.
Ẓẓgent tafunast-nni.
Ẓẓgeɣ tafunast-nni.
Ẓẓher bu iɣisi.
Ẓẓher i sɛiɣ.
Ẓẓher iruḥen ur iban.
Ẓẓher-is yečča-t umcic, yewwi-t deg tfesqa.
Ẓẓher-iw i ẓriɣ yeɛkes.
Ẓẓher-iw isem-is fiḥel.
Ẓẓher-iw yeẓheḍ tabburt.
Ẓẓiɣ acaruq n yiṭij mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ.
Ẓẓiɣ baṭaṭa di tebḥirt-nneɣ akked yemma.
Ẓẓiɣ imɣi n lwerd ɣef ubalkun.
Ẓẓiɣ leǧnan d imselles, lxux d ifires.
Ẓẓiɣ taneqlet.
Ẓẓiɣ tibḥirt deg Izubaq.
Ẓẓiḍer.
Ẓẓlemt iɣallen-nkumt.
Ẓẓlen ɣef tgertilt.
Ẓẓlen.
Ẓẓlent.
Ẓẓlet iɣallen-nwen.
Ẓẓleɣ ɣef umeṭreḥ-iw.
Ẓẓleɣ ɣef umeṭreḥ.
Ẓẓleɣ.
Ẓẓu lebṣel, ad tertiḥeḍ.
Ẓẓulen akk.
Ẓẓulen meṛṛa.
Ẓẓullen.
Ẓẓulleɣ.
Ẓẓur d lfuci imeεfan.
Ẓẓur deg-neɣ yetḥennec.
Ẓẓur fell-as yeckunṭeḍ.
Ẓẓur i lǧid, d asalas.
Ẓẓɛen-t seg uxeddim.
Ẓẓɛen-t.
Ẓẓɛeɣ-t.
“At Simpson”, d amazrar n wunuɣen urmiden.
